overview: A quick peek over the fence will reveal a world beyond your wildest fantasies. It's a world of teddy bears, night gowns and pillow fights, as well as hand cuffs, dildo's and paddles. Join Janie and friends as they give new meaning to "friendly neighbor". Welcome to the world of the Girl Next Door!
tagline: The bush is always sweeter on the other side of the fence
title: Girl Next Door
